long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is simple tool that makes uploading photos to your NaijaLOL profile very easy. To use this tool you must be registered user on NaijaLOL. Visit http://www.naijalol.com to register and begin sharing funny photos. All you need to is right click on a photo and select upload to NaijaLOL.. Simple!
